title: Supply shift in the loanable funds market

content.question:
Use the graph to answer the question.

The loanable funds market is currently in equilibrium at a real interest rate of <math alttext="r sub 1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>r</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>. An increase in household savings will affect the loanable funds market in which of the following ways?

choices.label: There will be a surplus of funds and the real interest rate will increase.
There will be a shortage of funds and the real interest rate will decrease.
The demand for loanable funds will increase and the real interest rate will increase.
The supply of loanable funds will increase and the real interest rate will increase.
The supply of loanable funds will increase and the real interest rate will decrease.

content.answer: The supply of loanable funds will increase and the real interest rate will decrease.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
